data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Gorno-Badakhshan with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Gorno-Badakhshan, Tajikistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 156 believers in Gorno-Badakhshan to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 156 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Gorno-Badakhshan, Tajikistan will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Father, I pray that the Yazgul people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Yazgul people know you.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Gorno-Badakhshan, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Gorno-Badakhshan against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Gorno-Badakhshan.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

location.name: Gorno-Badakhshan
location.cities_list: Khorugh, Ishqoshim, Murghob, Khandūd, Kekeya’er Ke’erkezizu
location.cities_list_w_pop: Khorugh (30,000), Ishqoshim (26,000), Murghob (10,815), Khandūd (5,521), Kekeya’er Ke’erkezizu
